column1: Small businesses are the backbone of our community in #CA44.  Now during #COVID19 #SmallBiz needs our help more than ever. Today and every day lift up your neighbors and #ShopSmall. #SmallBusinessSaturday https://t.co/L5aQYOxXEA

This #Thanksgiving the best way to give thanks to our family community and country is to protect one another by doing our part to stop the spread of COVID-19.    Follow @CDCgov's guidance. These tips will save lives: https://t.co/l3nl0dwA4G https://t.co/C6LLEYbR3x
Governor Newsom has announced a nightly curfew for most of CA including LA County to fight the spread of #COVID19. #StopTheSpread #TheRiskIsReal https://t.co/jRaxlzTueC

With rising #COVID19 cases and hospitalizations in LA County restrictions are tightening to help save lives. Updated rules below ⬇️  Please do your part and help keep our community safe. #TheRiskIsReal https://t.co/WRFiCFz6ld

Progress on a #COVID19 vaccine is encouraging but it’s not here yet. Let’s be the example this holiday season and not let our guard down.  A future vaccine can’t help people who are sick now or prevent loved ones from getting infected over the holidays. https://t.co/OCcDXENc6c

This is a concerning moment for our state. As of Thurs 1 million Californians have been infected with #COVID19.   We have already lost so many members of our community & we’re at risk of losing many more.   Stay home. Keep distance. #WearAMask. Stay Safe. https://t.co/kDGGME0YXU

The New England Medical Journal said the way that President Trump has handled the virus has been “dangerously incompetent” response. #Fact #COVID19

The Senate should have been working on #COVID relief pkg for the American people like the House did – twice.   Instead they are fast tracking the confirmation of a  #SCOTUS justice who will end the #ACA and cut health care for millions.   These are not priorities #ForThePeople.

The threat of this deadly virus is not going away.   Just like this summer #COVID19 cases are on the rise & experts are warning it will likely get worse.   Throughout Halloween and the Holidays we MUST be careful and safe. #WearAMask https://t.co/KT65ChqI0X

#COVID19 has highlighted the racial inequities across the nation that Congress cannot ignore. As we rebuild from this pandemic communities of color can’t afford a return to “normal.”   We need a bold green stimulus that rights environmental injustices & builds a green economy. https://t.co/Y7byRosGIj

Join me and my colleagues from the @HispanicCaucus + @ClimateCrisis at 12 PDT/3 EDT for a LIVE roundtable discussion.  We’ll be talking about environmental justice public health and #COVID19’s impact on Latino & Hispanic communities.  Watch: https://t.co/Pz0ZK2COje #HHM2020

Every day more and more Americans are dying of #COVID19. Yet Senate Republicans are focused on rushing to confirm the President’s #SCOTUS pick to overturn the #ACA.  A vote for the President’ nominee is a vote to take away healthcare from millions of Americans.

The President continues to defy CDC guidance to avoid large events and gatherings. Worse I have not yet heard he has tested negative for #COVID19 since being hospitalized.   This is reckless and irresponsible. We don’t need another super spreader event at the White House. https://t.co/Fl2YmfQiri
Let the record reflect 210k+ Americans have died of Covid19 because of the incompetence of the Trump Administration.

It’s despicable for POTUS to say COVID-19 is a “blessing from God” when so many people have died lost loved ones or are still feeling the long-term health impacts after recovering from this virus. https://t.co/vBGUvrblr5

The President is turning his back on the American people by walking away from Covid relief negotiations.  210K Americans are dead. Families are struggling. Small businesses are closing.  And still we don’t have a plan of action on COVID 19 testing & contact tracing. Incompetent. https://t.co/pn6iDk96a5

.@HouseDemocrats agree with Chair Powell: We need quick action to avoid economic disaster due to #COVID19. That's why we passed the #HeroesAct. #ForThePeople  With 210K dead millions unemployed and small biz hurting the Senate needs to take action. https://t.co/eRxrETKJwY

Glad to hear the President will be out of the hospital today and going home. Can we be assured he will remain in quarantine and not unnecessarily expose others as he did yesterday? He still has COVID.

“Don’t be afraid of Covid” says the guy (POTUS) who is “getting world class medical care” per his doctors. Not only does he continue to downplay the harms of COVID but he is actively trying to strip away healthcare from Millions of Americans.

If POTUS and FLOTUS can contract #COVID19 any of us can. We all have to take precautions and wear masks but we must do more to protect the people.   It’s long overdue but we need a national coronavirus testing tracing and treatment plan. https://t.co/bCB1Ggb230

The GOP has blocked action on critical #COVID19 relief funding for months.   $$ for schools unemployment and coronavirus testing: all blocked.   Yesterday House R’s blocked a bill to save the jobs of 1000’s in the airline industry.   Who WILL they help? https://t.co/rp8RljJ0zW

Unfortunately POTUS’ experience with COVID may determine if he changes his tune and attitude or not. If he quickly recovers & is symptom free will he continue to mock those who wear a mask? Will he still say (re: deaths) “it is what it is”? Or continue to downplay its danger?

200k+ Americans have died of COVID-19. No one wants more deaths. The President will get treatment other Americans cannot - rapid/multiple COVID testing top notch healthcare with daily doctor assessments and who knows what prescriptions. All Americans deserve the same care.

#COVID19 outbreaks at federal prisons like #TerminalIsland are extremely troubling. DOJ and BOP must protect their inmates and staff.  That's why @SenWarren @SenBooker and I have a bill to require oversight and protection at these vulnerable facilities. https://t.co/93EEDnqdsu

Just now: Dr Faccui testified on @HispanicCaucus virtual forum on Covid-19 impact on Latinos that earliest vaccine could come at end of the year or early next year. Anyone who says that it could be earlier doesn’t understand clinical trials and how they work.

In May House Democrats passed bills with funds for #COVID19 testing tracing and treatment along with critical economic relief #ForThePeople. Now they're sitting on @senatemajldr's desk.   He is blocking these bipartisan bills & 100’s of others from becoming law. #HeroesActNow https://t.co/Iry9MJaIFK

In 2020 the Latino vote is more powerful than ever! Even with the challenges of #COVID19 we need to make sure we are registered and ready to vote this November.   Remember: it is safe and secure to #VoteByMail. All eligible voters in CA will be mailed their ballot! https://t.co/0LEw2nUaqn

The loss of 200000 people to #COVID19 is astounding. We can never fill the hole that the loss of these family members friends neighbors & elders leave behind.  It didn't have to be like this. We need true leadership informed by science to prevent more deaths. #ForThePeople https://t.co/39PKfR95Zb

This #WorldAlzheimersDay I think of my mom Teresa and the millions of others with #Alzheimers. It is not easy.  And #COVID19 has made the challenge of managing #dementia even more difficult.  Join our fight to #EndALZ. https://t.co/cS4Y6ovDPH

But every day @senatemajldr is blocking bipartisan bills like these from becoming law https://t.co/FftTdZmbNk

Substance use & mental health disorders don’t discriminate. These issues affect us all and the #COVID19 pandemic has made recovery even more difficult for those who are struggling. We must work together to support those in recovery.   Proud to support National #RecoveryMonth. https://t.co/MWo9eMVrlj

Summer is ending and we can’t afford to head into flu season without every possible resource necessary to fight #COVID19.    But instead of helping the American people the Senate is confirming judges. Stop playing politics with people's lives. Pass the #HeroesAct! #ForThePeople https://t.co/chkABOReJ4

This week marks 26 yrs of the Violence Against Women Act.  #VAWA's critical protections must be strengthened and fully funded especially as domestic violence has sadly increased during #COVID19.  The Senate must take action. EVERYONE has the right to live free from abuse.

¡Es el Mes de la Herencia Hispana! Las comunidades hispanas son orgullosas y resistentes y lo han sido por generaciones.  Estamos enfrentando desigualdades de COVID19 y una administración antiinmigrante.   Los enfrentaremos juntos y saldremos aún más fuertes. #HHM2020 #HHM https://t.co/5vpPjm943j

It’s Hispanic Heritage Month #HHM! Hispanic communities are proud resilient and have been for generations.   We're facing #COVID19 inequities unemployment & an anti-immigrant administration.   We'll face these together weather these storms and emerge even stronger. #HHM2020 https://t.co/FNC1i4xfwp

This President is harmful to your health and our democracy. He has no problem lying to the American people about the dangers of Covid. Today I am still so grateful for our brave first responders – serving us on both the frontlines of #COVID19 and fighting deadly wildfires in the west.   America’s first responders are true heroes.
